label: 伊勢斎宮寮
対訳語: Bureau of High Priestess of the Great Ise Shrine
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Bureau (ryō) in charge of all affairs concerning the High Priestess of the Great Ise Shrine (Saigū ). It was called at first the Saigūryō (Bureau of the High Priestess [ of the Great Ise Shrine ]. [寮、斎宮、斎宮寮]
